Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2013 03:00AM mc_in_nc wrote: I am in the clinical trial at Baptist in Winston-Salem for the Dignicap.  I had my first treatment using the dignicap on Sept. 17th.  A pilot study was done a couple of years ago on 20 women, and this study has approx 110 women in CA, NC, and NY participating in the dignistudy.  I will keep you updated on my progress. Thank you,
